name: WILL: A Wonderful World / WILL：美好世界
description: Become a god and help change the fate of people, even the world! In WILL: A Wonderful World, you will receive letters written by characters living in urban cities. By rearranging the order and combinations of sentences in these letters, you are going to alter the destiny of whomever that wrote them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000 Storage: 3 GB available space
